page.shortlink: api desktop api ui edit code function
page.description: Prompt for a some Xbasic code. Mode: 0 - don't validate code, 1 - warn if error, 2 - require code to be free of errors
page.syntax: Data as P = ui_edit_code(C string [,C title [,L showInteractiveWindow [,N mode ]]])

argument.name: Data
argument.description: The key pressed to exit and the text entered into the dialog box.

argument.name: title
argument.description: Optional. The title of the dialog box.

page.discussion: The UI_EDIT_CODE() function displays a code editor dialog box and returns the text that the user inputs.
page.example: ? ui_edit_code("a5_xdialog_listbox", "My Editor") = lastbutton = "ok" text = "The code entered into the dialog."
